page.title: 05CLUBS IN GODMERSHAM
page.content: Local clubs form an important part of community life. The Gardeners Club established over 54 years ago, has the largest membership and organises the annual flower and produce show. Godmersham with Crundale W.I. is still thriving after 54 years and organinses monthly meetings, educational outings and craft events. The craft group are currently working on a banner depicting village scenes. Godmersham Brownies have a full pack, meeting weekly. Their activities include fund raising for themselves and childrens charities. The Village Cricket Club, reformed in 1980, uses the recreation field, adjoining the Village Hall. Other clubs meeting regularily at the Hall include Olde Time Dancers, East Kent Spinners and a Ladies Luncheon Club.
